Food Pantry is located at 107 S. Main, Haworth OK 74740.  The H2H Food Pantry has been in continuous operation since 1989. The pantry was previously located in Idabel, Oklahoma from 1989 until May, 2015.  In June, 2025, the pantry was moved from Idabel to Haworth, and has been in continuous operation at Haworth since 2015.  Our mission statement since 1989 has always been \" People Helping People in Emergencies .\"    Our sole purpose is to provide emergency food to people struggling with food insecurity and/or hunger.  We do not provide any other services.    ", "notes": "", "contactName": "Lorrie Davis ", "contactPhone": "580-286-6383", "contactEmail": "handtohandinc@outlook.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, Senior Program (CSFP) , TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "Diabetic/Low Sugar", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 82, "regionName": "Food Bank of Eastern Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "60490bc4-b621-4409-a570-a7ffebd9708e.png", "website": "https://okfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM ( )", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM ( )", "Thursday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM ( )", "Friday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM ( )"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
